data.name: Rhythm Tetris
data.detailed_description:
In this game, your tetris stacking rhythm synths with music.
During the rhythm part, tetromino will not drop, press the hard drop key when the note moves to the time bar. Otherwise, the tetromino will break and san value will decrease.
When the melody part comes, tetromino behaves just like the shape in a common Tetris game. But san value will decrease constantly, it will challenge you to stack shape fast.
If the san value is below zero, one garbage line will be added.

feature

Innovative Mechanic to Play Tetris

Create Your Own Level With the editor

Share Your Level On Steam Workshop

data.short_description: Rhythm Tetris - fusing Tetris with Music. Tap rhythm with harddrop, and feel melody with stack. Create your own level and share it with other Players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
